Board.name: billard
Board.author: Bruno Coudoin (bruno.coudoin@gcompris.net)
Board.title: The football game
Board.description: Kick the ball into the goal
Board.manual: Point the mouse and click on the ball, to set the speed and direction of the ball. The closer you click to the center, the slower the ball moves.
Board.goal: Kick the ball into the black hole on the right
